content: I’m sorry about that, I’m Italian and some subtleties of the English language are still unknown to me, However I’ve done a quick research and seems that the world has not yet decided what is the correct form to be used for gender-neutral pronouns. At the end I’m going with Shakespeare’s style (singular they) instead of Coleridge style (it) as it both sounds good to me and maintain a distinction between human beings and all the other things.
